pages.text: $(thing)Fluix Crystals$() are used for several recipes. They are obtained by throwing $(l:ae2:getting_started/charger)Charged Fluix Crystals$(/l), $(item)Redstone$(), and $(item)Nether Quartz$() into a pool of water.$(br2)They can be crushed into $(thing)Fluix Dust$() in an $(l:ae2:getting_started/inscriber)Inscriber$(/l).$(br2)There is also a Block form, and it can be used to upgrade $(l:ae2:equipment/quartz_tools#fluix)Quartz Tools$(/l).
